title: Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 3663 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




October 13, 2009

 



Statement by the Press Secretary on H.R. 3663




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  ___________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                     October 13, 2009 STATEMENT BY THE PRESS SECRETARY ON H.R. 3663  On Tuesday, October 13, 2009, the President signed into law: H.R. 3663, which delays from October 1, 2009, to January 1, 2010, the requirement for pharmacies that supply durable medical equipment under Medicare to meet certain accreditation requirements.
